entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is being bid farewell by his relatives and friends.

entities.name: hestia
entities.description: Hestia is a person who is also bidding farewell to Harry.

entities.name: diggle
entities.description: Diggle is a person who is leaving the room and waving goodbye to Harry.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt. She is present in the scene but does not interact much with Harry.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin. He is being bid farewell by Harry and his mother.

relationships.description: Harry watches Diggle leave the room.
Hestia bids farewell to Harry (inverse of previous relationship).
Harry watches Diggle leave the room.
Dudley is being held by his mother, Aunt Petunia.
